channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 卡塔尔正寻求在欧洲和亚洲达成更多天然气交易，押注需求将继续增长
item.description:
Qatar is seeking more gas deals in Europe and Asia in a bet that demand will continue to grow https://t.co/TiGsyAm61e

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 低成本航空公司亚航（AirAsia）的创始人托尼-费尔南德斯（Tony Fernandes）说，航空业正在经历一个 "紫斑期"，座位需求远远超过运力需求，飞行员短缺进一步阻碍了新的竞争。
item.description:
The aviation industry is experiencing a “purple patch” with demand for seats far outstripping capacity and a shortage of pilots further discouraging any fresh competition, Tony Fernandes, the founder of low-cost carrier AirAsia, says https://t.co/BO3vUTo5wE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，韦丹塔公司 8.94 亿美元债券的利息支付因存在差异而延迟处理
item.description:
Interest payment on Vedanta’s $894 million bond processed with a delay due to a discrepancy, sources say https://t.co/ajaZ8WjyF5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 英国最高反垄断执法机构对八家房屋建筑商展开调查，探究潜在的信息共享问题
item.description:
Britain’s top antitrust enforcer opens an investigation into eight housebuilders to probe potential information sharing https://t.co/SPGybapdby

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 利比亚西部的一个油田和一条通往意大利的天然气线路在短暂停运后恢复运行，因为在政府保证满足抗议者的要求后，抗议者撤出了这些设施
item.description:
An oil field in western Libya and a natural gas link to Italy resumes after a short halt as protesters withdrew from the facilities following assurances from the government that their demands would be met https://t.co/XqfYpWwvSh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 面对日益严峻的地缘政治挑战，欧盟各国财长在如何以最佳方式统一资本市场的问题上意见不一。阅读布鲁塞尔版
item.description:
European Union finance ministers are at loggerheads over how best to unify capital markets in the face of increasing geopolitical challenges. Read the Brussels Edition https://t.co/VB4P0bojEa

item.title: @Johnauthers 说，从 "美国优先 "到特朗普的不确定性，美元走强看起来像是一种新常态。利率和股票正在发挥各自的作用
item.description:
From America First to Trump uncertainty, @johnauthers says, a stronger dollar is looking like the new normal. Rates and stocks are playing their part https://t.co/NWn8PjqJob

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 中国钢铁需求疲软，铁矿石跌至四个月低点
item.description:
Iron Ore Falls to Four-Month Low on Weak China Steel Demand https://t.co/ncAOmqEmkT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据《论坛快报》报道，巴基斯坦已达到国际货币基金组织（IMF）对电力部门债务和电价的要求，此举可能有助于该国获得下一笔 12 亿美元的贷款。
item.description:
Pakistan has met the IMF’s requirements for power sector debt and electricity prices, a move that may help the country access the next loan tranche of $1.2 billion, The Express Tribune reports https://t.co/14AZmzhzBM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 迪斯尼与信实工业签署具有约束力的协议，合并双方在印度的媒体业务
item.description:
Disney and Reliance Industries sign a binding pact to merge their media operations in India https://t.co/UcK5KnEpft pic.twitter.com/vDD1HocQ9W

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) February 26, 2024

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特在致投资者的信中表示，日本贸易公司奉行的股东友好政策 "优于 "美国的政策，因此巴菲特最喜爱的日本贸易公司股价攀升
item.description:
Warren Buffett’s favorite Japanese trading houses climbed after he said in his letter to investors the companies follow shareholder-friendly policies that are “superior” to those practiced in the US https://t.co/Ss5duo6nhU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 如果大多数经济学家的观点被证明是正确的，以色列央行再次降息以帮助受战争打击的经济，那么以色列将进一步偏离美联储制定的政策路线
item.description:
Israel will diverge even further from the policy path set out by the Federal Reserve if most economists prove right and the central bank cuts interest rates again to help the war-hit economy https://t.co/Qfuci67Cev

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy）是比特币最大的上市企业持有者，该公司的 X 账户似乎遭到了黑客攻击，一些人受骗将资金交给了攻击者。
item.description:
MicroStrategy, the largest publicly-traded corporate holder of Bitcoin, appeared to suffer a hack on its X account that tricked some people into handing over funds to the attacker https://t.co/erJwAa9Ieu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 一个香港记者组织对计划中的新安全法表示担忧，称宽泛的犯罪定义可能会损害记者在亚洲金融中心进行报道的能力。
item.description:
A Hong Kong journalist group has raised concerns about a planned new security law, saying a broad definition of offenses could hurt journalists’ ability to report in the Asian financial hub https://t.co/VIvKJLrrFH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 全球金融压力的缓解增强了以日元为资金来源的套利交易的诱惑力，增加了该货币的贬值风险，从而提高了日本当局进行干预的可能性
item.description:
Easing financial stress globally has boosted the allure of yen-funded carry trades, adding to depreciation risks for the currency that would raise the chances of intervention from Japanese authorities https://t.co/ioluDTHPMP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 中国贵州省的一家国有企业正在出售债券，以帮助偿还地方政府融资工具发行的债务，这一罕见举动凸显了该地区流动性紧张的问题。
item.description:
A state-owned firm in China’s Guizhou province is selling bonds to help repay debt issued by a local government financing vehicle, a rare move that highlights the region’s liquidity strains https://t.co/HhPmNb6zES

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚国王苏丹易卜拉欣-依斯干达表示，他不会接受任何可能破坏国家政治稳定的请求，这对首相安瓦尔-易卜拉欣的政府是一个鼓舞。
item.description:
Malaysia’s King Sultan Ibrahim Iskandar said he would not entertain any request that may undermine the country’s political stability, in a boost to Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim’s administration https://t.co/BYSr85LKgk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚煤炭企业怀特黑文煤炭公司吸引了 17 家私人信贷提供商和一家银行的 11 亿美元贷款，用于购买两个煤矿
item.description:
Australian coal firm Whitehaven Coal drew 17 private credit providers and one bank for a $1.1 billion loan to buy two mines https://t.co/6WoFcT3EoF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 随着并购活动反弹，亚太地区贷款机构预计 2024 年银团贷款额将上升
item.description:
Asia-Pacific lenders expect syndicated loan volume to rise in 2024 as M&A activity rebounds https://t.co/qphjokZQQg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 韩国呼吁约 9,000 名离职的实习医生在周四之前返回工作岗位，以结束导致人们被急诊室拒之门外的抗议活动。
item.description:
South Korea calls on about 9,000 trainee doctors who have walked off the job to return to work by Thursday, trying to end a protest that has led to people being turned away from emergency rooms https://t.co/xsv4WXAQWr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据美联社报道，埃菲尔铁塔在关闭六天后重新向游客开放，因为罢工员工要求涨薪并对这座历史性地标进行更好的维护
item.description:
The Eiffel Tower reopens to visitors after a six-day closure as striking employees demand salary hikes and better maintenance of the historic landmark, AP reports https://t.co/Pj7gGkFTus

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 一家量化基金找到了在近期中国股市大跌中击败同行的方法--买入最无聊的公司
item.description:
One quantitative fund found a way to trounce its peers during the recent selloff in China stocks — buy the most boring companies https://t.co/kCW4wIOYO6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 新消息：与印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪关系密切的亿万富豪正在接管新闻机构。
item.description:
NEW: Billionaire tycoons close to Prime Minister Narendra Modi are taking over news outlets.

Journalists say diluted coverage illustrates the taming of India's once-riotous media https://t.co/llz6dSuXsF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 蚂蚁金服集团出人意料地击败花旗集团，收购瑞士信贷在中国的投资银行业务，此举将受到监管部门的严格审查

Ant Group outbids Citadel for Credit Suisse’s investment bank venture in China, in a surprise move that will be subject to close regulatory scrutiny https://t.co/9a2gOOLCWy

item.title: 新消息：国际投资者又多了一个远离中国的理由：一场突如其来的打压正在改写计算机驱动的交易规则。阅读大事件 ⬇️
item.description:
NEW: International investors have yet another reason to stay away from China: a sudden clampdown that’s rewriting the rules of computer-driven trading.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ https://t.co/Ptzd4bu1PM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 新的研究显示，精神健康危机正困扰着英国年轻人，并使许多人无法参加工作，有可能使一代人的前景黯淡无光。
item.description:
A mental health crisis is gripping young Britons and keeping many out of the workforce, threatening to blight the prospects of a generation, according to new research https://t.co/sfd2XiChtz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 高盛已从穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment）获得 10 亿美元，将在亚洲开展更多私人信贷交易
item.description:
Goldman has clinched $1 billion from Mubadala Investment to scour for more private credit deals in Asia https://t.co/tlltN584KM
